sentences.en: "I always slept with her backtowards me and myright arm under her neck and my left arm over her, "Thomas said.
sentences.cn: “我睡觉时总是让她背朝着我，她的脖子可以枕在我的右臂上，而我的左臂就抱着她。” 托马斯说。

sentences.en: Each passenger slept on the berth allotted to him.
sentences.cn: 每个旅客都睡在分配给他的铺位上.
那天晚上几乎没人睡觉。

sentences.en: He began to drink, drank himself to intoxication, till he slept obliterated.
sentences.cn: 他一直喝, 喝到他快要迷糊地睡着了.

sentences.en: He slept badly at night and couldn't concentrate in class at daytime.
sentences.cn: 他夜里睡不好,白天上课时思想开小差.

sentences.en: He slept feverishly all afternoon and into the night.
sentences.cn: 他发着烧，睡了一下午，一直睡到晚上。

sentences.en: His clothes were creased, as if he had slept in them.
sentences.cn: 他的衣服皱巴巴的，好像他是穿着衣服睡的。

sentences.en: I slept during the football game.
sentences.cn: 足球比赛的时候我睡觉。

sentences.en: I'm pretty sure they slept together before they were married.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定他们结婚之前就上过床了。

sentences.en: I'm sorry I'm late; I slept through the clock this morning.
sentences.cn: 对不起我迟到了, 今早我睡得太沉,没听见闹钟响.

sentences.en: Nick, on the sofa, hardly slept.
sentences.cn: 尼克在沙发上几乎没睡。

sentences.en: She slept around a lot of people before she got married.
sentences.cn: 她在结婚前和很多人有过性关系.

sentences.en: She slept deeply but woke early.
sentences.cn: 她睡得很熟但醒得很早。

sentences.en: She slept fitfully, her mind crowded with confusing dreams.
sentences.cn: 她时睡时醒，脑子里做着各种怪梦。

sentences.en: They slept till the alarm bleeper woke them at four.
sentences.cn: 他们一直睡到4点钟被寻呼机闹钟叫醒.

sentences.en: They were suffocated as they slept.
We slept in hammocks slung beneath the roof.
sentences.cn: 我们睡在悬在房顶下的吊床上。

phrases.tran_cn: 深度睡眠；睡眠的深层状态
快速眼动睡眠（等于paradoxical sleep）
睡眠呼吸暂停；睡眠呼吸中止症
v. 借宿，在别人家里过夜；忽视
睡着一直什么也没听见；也没被唤醒或惊醒
与某人同眠共枕；与某人发生性关系

trans.tran_cn: 睡觉（ sleep的过去式和过去分词 ）
